sources.title: The Last Mouse of Hamelin (1955)
sources.description: The Pied Piper has led all of the mice in Hamelin into the sea with the exception of one because he was tone-deaf. The cats are all competing with each other for the single, surviving mouse, aka the Last of the Mice. He outwits them all, woos and wins a cute girl-mouse from the next village, sets up housekeeping and starts a new line of Hamelin mice. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-last-mouse-of-hamelin-1955/

metadata.Plot: The Pied Piper has led all of the mice in Hamelin into the sea with the exception of one because he was tone-deaf. The cats are all competing with each other for the single, surviving mouse, aka the Last of the Mice. He outwits them all, woos and wins a cute girl-mouse from the next village, sets up housekeeping and starts a new line of Hamelin mice.
metadata.Writer: Tom Morrison, Bob Kuwahara, Paul Terry
